manifest.name: @endemolshinegroup/cosmiconfig-typescript-loader

scripts.build:docs: rimraf docs/api && typedoc --out docs/api --target es6 --theme minimal --mode file src

manifest.readme:
![Banner][icon-banner]

[![MIT Licensed][icon-license]][link-license]
[![NPM Version][icon-npm]][link-npm]
[![Build Status][icon-ci]][link-ci]
[![Greenkeeper Status][icon-greenkeeper]][link-greenkeeper]

[![Code Issues][icon-issues]][link-issues]
[![Codebase Maintainability][icon-maintainability]][link-maintainability]
[![Test Coverage][icon-coverage]][link-coverage]
[![Jest][icon-jest]][link-jest]

[![Commitizen][icon-commitizen]][link-commitizen]
[![Semantic Release][icon-semantic-release]][link-semantic-release]
[![Prettier][icon-prettier]][link-prettier]

A TypeScript loader for Cosmiconfig

## Installation

```bash
yarn add @endemolshinegroup/cosmiconfig-typescript-loader
```

## Usage

```typescript
import cosmiconfig from 'cosmiconfig';
import TypeScriptLoader from '@endemolshinegroup/cosmiconfig-typescript-loader';

const explorer = cosmiconfig('myModuleName', {
  loaders: {
    '.ts': {
      async: TypeScriptLoader,
    },
  },
});
```
